channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- PowerLogic HDPM6000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- PowerLogic HDPM6000

item.title: CVE-2023-28004|2023-04-18T21:16:01.333Z -- schneider%20electric -- powerlogic%20hdpm6000
item.description: A CWE-129: Improper validation of an array index vulnerability exists where a specially crafted Ethernet request could result in denial of service or remote code execution.
